title: Fork
description: Four-tined with stylized, pointed rattail join with singular engraved line continuing along shaft that forms oval at base of handle that expands outward with stylized double row of horizontal ovals ending in engraved square with double outline. Reverse engraved and decorated as 1996-106-1.
name: Fork
